title: FermiHDI HD Node Registration Request
description: The JSON Schema for the request a new node must use to register with a DMS

id.description: The unique id of the node, should be set by an environment variable

nodeType.description: The type of node, should be set by an environment variable

address.description: The IP/FQDN address of the node

publicKeyAlgorithm.description: The type of the public key for this node, should be set by an environment variable

publicKey.description: The public key for the node

keyFingerprint.description: The fingerprint for the nodes private key
